message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price. I think you'll really love it!
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer! I'm really interested but $120 is a bit more than I'm comfortable paying. Would you be willing to come down to $90?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob! I can do $105, but that's as low as I can go. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure I get a fair price for this amazing product.
Alice, $105 is still a bit too high for me. How about $100? That's a fair price for both of us and lets me close this deal today.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I can see you're really interested in the product. I'm willing to meet you at $105 was my bottom line, but I can try to do better. I'll meet you at $102.50. That's the best I can do.

Alice, I really appreciate you trying to work with me. While $102.5 is closer, it's still above my budget. I'm going to stick with my previous offer of $100. It's a fair price for both of us, and I'd like to close this deal today.

I understand you're trying to stick to your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll meet you at $102.50 was my previous best, but I can do $101.50. That's as low as I can go without losing money on the deal.
